title: What do you do in LeaverBuster?
body: I like to read guides! What about you?

replies.body: play on my other acc xD

I usually just look for a YouTube video that fills in that time for waiting.

(Damn champ select is my worst enemy when it comes to LeaverBuster)

I usually watch youtube when I get a leaverbuster. 

I would like to recommend to you a youtube channel that is rather entertaining, go search up
Swoozie


He tells story while using animation and they are really funny.
I've never been Leaverbusted so I have no idea, I'd probably end up reading a book or something to occupy my time.
